textBox.richText: Last week in Websummit, we trialled our active WiFi badges. We gave away 100 badges to investors and start-ups and collected their anonymous radio signal to detect their interactions through our deployed gateways. It was our biggest deployment in a very challenging (dense) area. Our analysis and insights will follow shortly, and we hope to cover the next event with 1000 badges. If you are interested in knowing more about what insights and analytics our system can provide for your events, drop me an email.
